while preserving the subject's facial expression, pose, composition, and background elements.
同时保留主体的面部表情、姿势、构图和背景元素。

Using the style of the reference image, generate 【replaceable scene description】.
你只需输入一张参考图，模型就能提取其视觉风格，并将这种风格应用到全新的画面场景中，【】中的内容可替换新的图像提示词。

将图像转换为逼真的夜景
-----------------------------------------------
Change the lighting to flat lighting environment with a low saturation color and ambient glow, while maintaining the same composition and subject placement.
将灯光调整为低饱和度色彩且带有环境光晕的平面照明环境，同时保持构图和主体位置不变。
Change the lighting to flat lighting environment with a warm and ambient glow, while maintaining the same composition and subject placement.
将灯光调整为平面光照环境，营造出温暖且具有环境光的氛围，同时保持构图和主体位置不变。

Monochromatic lighting
单色照明

Glamour lighting
时尚照明


Convert the image to a realistic night scene, preserving shadow detail, environmental visibility, and preventing crushed blacks. Maintain the original composition and object placement. Design architectural lighting based on the building's form, ensuring it looks natural and enhances the structure.
将图像转换为逼真的夜景，保留阴影细节和环境可见度，避免暗部细节丢失。保持原始构图和物体位置。根据建筑物的形态设计建筑照明，确保其看起来自然且能突出建筑结构。

-----------------------------------------------
kimi打光融图[建议组合kontext融图打光(免费开放)_kimi打光融图_强度建议1.5]：
Rectify any unrealistic compositing or layering within the image. Improve lighting coherence to seamlessly integrate the foreground subject with the background. This includes adding physically accurate shadows and reflections and removing all visible seams or edges. The overall integration into the environment should be enhanced, but the original composition and essential elements must be retained. The existing artistic style must remain unchanged.


Light-Fix-Kontext-Dev-LoRA专用提示词（强度建议1）：
Fuse this image into background. 
将此图像融合到背景中


kontext_全能溶图打光：
Correct the unrealistic overlapping effect in this image. Enhance lighting consistency to make elements blend naturally, with realistic shadows and reflections, and remove visual seams. While preserving the original composition and key elements, improve overall environmental integration. Do not alter the style.
修正此图像中不真实的重叠效果。增强光照一致性，使元素自然融合，呈现逼真的阴影和反射，并消除视觉接缝。在保留原始构图和关键元素的同时，提升整体环境融合度。
